description:
Encyclopedia of Russian History , 862-1917 years
picKategoriya : Encyclopedia
Developer: JSC Cominfo
Year: 2006
Language: Russian
Platform : WINDOWS 95/98 2000/XP
File Format: ISO
File size: 580 MB
Minimum hardware requirements:
- Pentium 100MHz
- 16Mb RAM
- 4-speed CD-ROM drive
- 16 -bit sound card
- "Mouse "
Description:
Information on the disc " Encyclopedia of Russian history. " covers the period from 862 to 1917. The main part of the text material is presented in four major sections: " Rulers ", " contemporary" , "Events" , "Monuments of culture." Besides the listed sections of CD-ROM contains the family tree of the two ruling dynasties in Russia - Rurik and Romanov , as well as a detailed chronological scale . Total disk space more than 1,000 articles, over 400 illustrations , video clips and animated maps for major battles .
The " rulers " you will find information about all the rules in the Russian princes , kings and emperors . Located next to the article scale rulers will allow you to move easily in the " time and space" , fall from one era to another , or to travel within the same period , comparing one board to another , watching the process of the development of political structures and social relations. Each of the articles is equipped with numerous hyperlinks , so that you can get in other sections of the disc more complete information on the event or you are interested persons. In addition, some of the articles selected footage accompanied by narration.
"Events" section - is a carefully selected list of major events or just interesting stories . You will learn about the adoption of Christianity in Russia , Russian princes campaigns , sieges of Constantinople , uprisings archers on how to Princess Olga avenged the death of her husband , a palace revolution , enthroned Elizabeth, and much more. A story about the events of the early period of Russian history is provided with numerous quotations from the chronicles . Articles about the most important battles and battles supplemented animated maps and narration .
Section " Contemporaries " contains extensive information about contemporaries Russian rulers, prominent people age, have left their mark in history, church figures , terrorists and regicide . For example, what role in the fate of the Empress Catherine II played Orlov brothers , what was the way of life of Grigory Rasputin , Marina Mnishek the inglorious career began brilliantly completion graph Dmitriev- Mamonov , one of the favorites of Catherine II. And here hypertext links allow you to travel freely around the " expanse of history."
The " Cultural Monuments " - superbly illustrated story about an unsurpassed masterpiece of Russian art. You will see the icons of Andrei Rublev , Theophanes the Greek . Without leaving your home , visit Veliky Novgorod, Vladimir , Kiev , see the wonderful cathedrals , frescoes, learn how to look " resonators " and what their prednaznachenie.Obshirnaya and extremely detailed chronological scale , as well as the main sections of the "Encyclopedia " , equipped with hypertext link will allow you to visualize historical process , to trace parallels stories , changing dynasties and rulers.
picPredstavlennoe family tree on the disk gives a visual representation of kinship members who ruled Russia until 1917 Dynasties - Rurik and Romanov . You will understand why Ivan the Terrible called himself Rjurikovich , learn that the founder of Moscow Yuri Dolgoruky was the son of Kiev Prince Vladimir Monomakh .
Highlighted articles hypertext terms are interpreted. What is a poll tax or " Table of Ranks "? What is the Boyar Duma ? What does the Holy Synod ? Answers to these questions are included in the glossary CD-ROM. Animated maps of wars and battles are a great visual aid . On them you will be able to follow the movement of troops , the course of battle, the balance of forces of the opposing sides . Maps provided with explanatory narration .
In working with a disk you will find extensive system , which is maintained at a certain time interval , by keyword, by one or more of the "Encyclopedia " . You can bookmark the most interesting articles . Easy interface allows you to easily navigate through the CD-ROM.
